DOC.brief_summary: This open label study design examine effect concurrent administration Radium Ra 223 dichloride Abiraterone Acetate plus Prednisone subject symptomatic castrate resistant prostate cancer bone metastasis , pre- post- chemotherapy setting . Both medication approve US Food Drug Administration indication .
DOC.brief_title: Open Label Phase Two Trial Radium Ra 223 Dichloride With Concurrent Administration Abiraterone Acetate Plus Prednisone Symptomatic Castration-Resistant ( Hormone-Refractory ) Prostate Cancer Subjects With Bone Metastasis
DOC.detailed_description: Approximately 40 subject enrol obtain 30 evaluable subject . All subject receive Radium Ra 223 dichloride every 4 week total 6 dos 24 week concurrent Abiraterone Acetate plus Prednisone minimum duration 26 week . Subjects evaluate 30 day last dose Radium Ra 223 dichloride . All adverse event deem study relate follow resolution . Including screening , total duration study 32 week .
DOC.criteria: Eligible subject conform inclusion criterion list : 1 . Subject must able understand willing sign write informed consent form . A sign informed consent form must appropriately obtain prior conduct trialspecific procedure . 2 . Subject willing able comply protocol , include study visit procedure . 3 . Subject male , great 18 year time enrollment . 4 . Life expectancy least 9 month . 5 . Subject histologically documented prostate cancer confirm pathology report prostate biopsy radical prostatectomy specimen . 6 . Subject must : • initiate stable dose daily Abiraterone Acetate plus Prednisone within 90 day enrollment , • plan initiate stable daily dose Abiraterone plus Prednisone within 30 day first Radium Ra 223 dichloride treatment . 7 . Subject must plan receive 6 Radium Ra 223 dichloride injection daily oral dos Abiraterone plus Prednisone trial , per protocol . 8 . Subject history bone metastasis prostate cancer evidence image perform within 90 day enrollment one following : • Tc Bone Scan • Sodium Fluoride PET/CT Scan *If bone scan use , solitary lesion could contribute cause prostate cancer must confirm second modality ( i.e . : plain film , CT Scan MRI . 9 . Subject Castrate Resistant Prostate Cancer , define rise PSA testosterone level < /= 50ng/dl ( 2.0 nM/L ) receive androgen deprivation therapy ( medical surgical castration ) . * PSA progression define least 2 rise PSA level take least 7 day apart 2nd PSA 2.0 ng/dl great . 10 . Subject presence bone pain require treatment : 1 ) EBRT within previous 12 week prior enrollment , 2 ) Analgesic medication ( include limit acetaminophen , NSAIDS , Cox2 inhibitor , narcotic Opioids ) . 11 . Subject ECOG performance status 02 screen 12 . Acceptable hematology serum biochemistry screen value : • White Blood Cell ( WBC ) > /= 3,000/mm3 Absolute Neutrophil Count ( ANC ) > 1500/mm3 Platelet ( PLT ) count > 100,000/mm3 Hemoglobin ( HGB ) > 10.0 g/dL ( 100g/L ; 6.2 mmol/L Creatinine < 1.5 ULN Total bilirubin level < 1.5 X ULN Aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) < 2.5 X ULN albumin > 25 g/L Baseline electrolytes within normal limit ( Sodium , potassium , chloride , calcium , phosphate , magnesium , LDH , γGT , urea , total protein ) 13 . Normal Liver Function Tests ( LFT ) normal Renal Function Tests ( RFT ) screen visit . If subject LFT 's RFT 's great 2.5 time upper limit normal ( ULN ) , Medical Monitor review , conjunction subject 's PI , require . 14 . Subjects receive AntiResorptive medication ( Zolendronic Acid denosumab ) must stable dose least 90 day prior enrollment ( Cycle 1/Week 1/ Day 1 ) . Antiresorptive medication may add subject 's regimen End Treatment visit complete . Antiresorptive medication withdrawal allow per Investigator discretion due adverse event attributable medication . 15 . Subjects childbearing potential must agree use adequate contraception begin enrollment least 30 day last dose study drug . The definition adequate contraception base judgment principal investigator designate associate . Eligible subject must meet exclusion criterion list : 1 . Subject know malignant pleural effusion , know lung , liver brain metastasis ( lymph node metastasis < 6 cm shortaxis diameter allow ) . 2 . Subject history visceral metastatic disease assess abdominal/pelvic CT chest xray within previous 8 week . 3 . Subject receive previous treatment Abiraterone Acetate longer 90 day prior enrollment , prior treatment Radium Ra 223 dichloride . 4 . Subject know medical contraindication Prednisone , Abiraterone Acetate Radium Ra 223 dichloride . 5 . Subject willing initiate stable dose daily Abiraterone Acetate plus Prednisone within 90 day enrollment , plan initiate stable daily dose Abiraterone Acetate plus Prednisone within 30 day first Radium Ra 223 dichloride treatment . 6 . Subject plan receive 6 infusion Radium Ra 223 Dichloride daily Abiraterone Acetate plus Prednisone trial , per protocol . 7 . Subject receive previous strontium89 , samarium153 , rhenium186 , rhenium188 treatment bone metastasis within 24 week prior enrollment . 8 . Subject receive denosumab Zolendronic Acid le 90 day prior enrollment , subject plan discontinue antiresorptive medication prior EOT visit . 9 . Subject receive investigational product experimental therapy within 4 week enrollment , initiation either plan prior EOT visit . 10 . Subject treatment cytotoxic chemotherapy within previous 4 week , plan prior End Treatment visit , failure recover adverse event due cytotoxic chemotherapy administer 4 week prior enrollment ( persistent myelosuppression , GI toxicity , severe fatigue ( ongoing neuropathy exclusionary ) . 11 . Subject history medical condition may compromise increase blood pressure , severe liver insufficiency ( r ChildPugh class B C ) . 12 . Subject history myocardial infarction cardiac arrhythmia within 6 month prior enrollment . 13 . Subject history previous radiotherapy > 25 % bone marrow , include hemibody radiation . 14 . Subject history malignancy within previous 5 year . A history squamous basal cell carcinoma lowgrade superficial bladder cancer adequately treat least 12 month prior enrollment exclusionary . 15 . Subject undergone major surgery within 4 week prior enrollment . 16 . Subject blood transfusion erythropoietin stimulation agent within 4 week enrollment . 17 . Subject know imminent establish spinal cord compression . 18 . Subject serious concurrent medical condition psychiatric illness . 19 . Subject history serious illness medical condition include , limited uncontrolled infection , congestive heart failure New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) class III IV , Crohn 's Disease Ulcerative Colitis , uncontrolled hypertension Bone Marrow Dysplasia screen . 20 . Subject condition , opinion investigator , would impair patient 's ability comply study procedure . 21 . Subject able swallow study treatment capsule . 22 . Subject unmanageable fecal incontinence . 23 . Subject history size pelvic lymphadenopathy think contributor current hydronephrosis .
